thread.title: Nancy C Rice
thread.title_full: Driver Support reviewed by Nancy C Rice

author: Nancy C Rice
title: Nancy C Rice
text:
I have used Driver Support for years . Questions - very few of them - answered - as well as the main goal of the necessary updating of drivers with very little effort on my part which I do appreciate as having to learn about each of these is not a thing I choose to do with my time and energy. Technology made easy for those of us who live far away from Austin, but safely taking care of what is needed to function in this world where the technology has, almost as if it was magic, made the connections we have around the globe easier and possible, opening barriers to communication that so enrich our lives.
spoke too soon. waiting for a response regarding this new system that does not seem to function as expected in spite of all i do including doing things again and again. would really like to have the additional program to function - how optimize?? will only get stuck. what am i doing wrong?
